attributes.title: it’s a no from me❤️
attributes.review: i wanted to get this app to help support our racist, homophobic, sexist, misogynistic president because i just loooooove❤️ him so much but this app was just awful. it took way to long to download and caused my phone to glitch and really drained my battery. i do not recommend this app. it is ✨ 𝒶𝓌𝒻𝓊𝓁✨

attributes.title: Trump killed my dog
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my dog foamed from the mouth and yelled Trump 2020 before getting in my car and crashing into a tree

This app is horrible, I literally got stds from this app and not to

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🤬
attributes.review: This app made my phone crash. It’s not worth the download at all. You owe me a 900 dollars trump because I had to buy a whole new phone.

attributes.title: Horrible app.
attributes.review: Hi my name is Karen and I voted DJT in 2016. The app itself works horribly and the quality is just horrible. I’d advise you not to get the app. All in all, horrible ap.
